title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: Bug 101187: When the localization key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the key in the properties file is not filled in, but it has a valid value, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: When the key in the properties file is not filled in, but it has a valid value, the externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Leave the key blank in the properties file, but ensure it has a valid value.
